title: vAzhiya gAndhi mahAtmA
sahitya:
vAzhiya gAndhi mahAtmA nIDu ezhil vAzhiya vAn puvi vaiyamum pOlE


anupallavi

  vazhagaDi vazhagaiyAga maNNilam vAzhndiDa puNNiyam sheidAr puNNiyam sheidAr


caraNam    bhArata dEshattai kAppAr nINDa pArnil paTriya jyOtiyAi pUttAr
PArinum karuNai mighundAr avar kaNNanin gItaiyai kaNNaDi ninrAr
